pageProduct.name: Scholl Odour Buster Daily Insole
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Odour Buster Everyday Insoles absorb perspiration to keep feet dry and the Active Charcoal Odour Neutraliser absorbs foot and shoe odour

WHY USE SCHOLL ODOUR BUSTER EVERYDAY INSOLES? 

• Natural charcoal technology effectively absorbs foot and shoe odour
• Absorbs perspiration to keep feet dry
• Odour neutralisation continues to work even when footwear is not being worn
• Triple layer design to provide comfort and odour protection

Boxed Contents: One pair insoles.

Size: 1 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• Dry and odour protected feet
• Active charcoal odour neutraliser
• Absorbs foot and shoe odour

Warnings

Discontinue use if discomfort or irritation occurs. If irritation persists, seek medical advice. Do not use in contact with broken or irritated skin. Do not use if you have a latex or coconut allergy. Not recommended for machine wash.

Directions

Step 1 Simply cut to your size using the printed cutter guideline.
Step 2 Insert into your shoes with cloth side up.

It is recommended to replace the insoles every 6 months or sooner if showing signs of wear.

USAGE ADVICE

Fits shoe size:
EU
A: 36 B: 37 C: 38 D: 39 E: - F: 40 G: 41 H: 42 I: 43 J: 44 K: 45 Full Length: 46

Recycling Code: 21 PAP
